bodytext_s: One nice, sunny, clean, single private bed room is available for rent. The place has a bonus sun room in a friendly and respectful environment. It has a large yard spaces in a quiet and safe neighborhood of San Jose. Looking for a professional or a student that is mature, responsible, peaceful, communicative, respectful, clean and willing to share light house chores. We keep the house in tidy, clean, neat condition and looking for someone who has similar qualities to share a delightful living space. The house has a vege / vegan kitchen so we will not be consuming meat or seafood at the property. You do not need to be vegetarian to live here, but keep in mind that inside this house it's pure vege food only. The house is also a green household. I compost, planting organic fruits, recycle with environmentally safe mindset. The house is usually quiet after 10pm, and people are respectful to each other and our surroundings.Washer + dryer are in exterior laundry room. There is extra storage space and a lot of other features, making this a very comfortable and cozy space: large, sunny yard & Organic garden, hard wood floors The room ($750 monthly rent with $70 utility / month, deposit is one month rent): wooden floor, one closet, large window with plenty of light throughout day time. Room can be unfurnished or furnished with twin-size bed, closet, desk, chair, and standing lamp. The utility will cover: PG&E (Electricity + Gas), Water, Garbage, Comcast High Speed Cable Internet. Sorry but there's no pets allowed, as much as I love animals but I have tenants who are allergic to cats / dogs, No Smoking, No Alcohol / Drugs Abuse, No Overnight Stay (with permission is Ok), No Party Animals, No Drama Queen, No MESSY People, No Dishonesty, and Absolutely No Illegal Acts. Credit/criminal check required to secure room, 1st month's rent due upon move-in. Minimal is 6 month rental. Location of this house is close to SJSU and downtown San Jose (2~3miles). Very close to grocery stores, eating joints, mall, parks and VTA bus stops. Within 3 miles we have: Valley Health Center, Costco, Cyote Creek Trail, Park and Recreation, San Jose Public Library (Tully Branch), Kelley's Park (Japanese Friendship Garden), The Plant Shopping Center: shops + restaurants, EastRidge Mall, 101 Freeway, San Jose Giants Minor League Baseball Stadium, San Jose Sharks Ice Hockey Stadium, SJSU Spartan Stadium, 87 Freeway, San Jose State University, San Jose Downtown Within 4~7 miles: Santana Row, San Jose Japan Town, HP Pavilion at San Jose, San Jose Airport, Santa Clara University, Sprouts Farmers Market, Trader Joe's, WholeFoods
